en.name: Customer types
en.coverDescription: Ever had to deal with a rude customer barking at you? A know-it-all patronizing you? A chatty Cathy who wouldn't leave your counter? An overthinker having trouble with decision-making? Then take this course to explore four common types of customer behaviour and some effective ways of dealing with them to get a constructive outcome.

fr.name: Adapter son approche selon les différents profils clients
fr.coverDescription: Avez-vous déjà eu affaire à un client grossier qui vous crie dessus ? Un client condescendant avec une attitude de je-sais-tout ? Une cliente bavarde qui ne voulait pas quitter votre comptoir ? Un excentrique qui a du mal à prendre des décisions ? Suivez ce cours pour découvrir quatre comportements types que peuvent avoir vos clients ainsi que des moyens efficaces pour y faire face et obtenir un résultat constructif.

de.name: Kundentypen
de.coverDescription:
DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH
Ever had to deal with a rude customer barking at you? A know-it-all patronizing you? A chatty Cathy who wouldn't leave your counter? An overthinker having trouble with decision-making? Then take this course to explore four common types of customer behaviour and some effective ways of dealing with them to get a constructive outcome.
